Generic Keyboard Encoder

pin Mode 1
Generic Alphabetic		 Mode 2
Generic Hexadecimal
A1 A 0
A2 B 1
A3 C 2
A4 D
 3
A5 E 4
A6 F 5
A7 G 6
A8 H 7
A9 I 8
A10 J 9
B1 K A
B2 L B
B3 M C
B4 N D
B5 O E
B6 P F
B7 Q Space
B8 R Enter
B9 S Tab
B10 Escape Escape
HWB Shift Shift
+5V +5V Power +5V Power
RST Reset Reset
Ground Ground Ground

Use HWB to toggle between the various modes. The active mode is remembered when KADE is powered off.
